text: Xanadu can mean * Another word for a utopia. * Xanadu, a song by Olivia Newton-John and Electric Light Orchestra. * Xanadu, a song by Rush * Xanadu, a 1980 American musical fantasy movie * Xanadu, the fictional palace in the movie Citizen Kane * Xanadu 2.0 - the main residence of Bill Gates
title: Xanadu
